description:
Are you a huge Washington basketball fan?  If you find yourself always wanting to know exactly what is happening with Washington, this is the app for you!  

With Basketball Fans - Washington you'll have access to the latest news, videos, stats, standings and scores.  You'll always know what's happening with the team!  

Plus you’ll find detailed team, roster and schedule information, so you’ll always be the most knowledgeable fan in the room.

You can also discuss the latest news with other Washington fans using the built in chat feature.  Make sure your voice is heard!

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Washington.  If you are a true Washington fan, you owe it to yourself to download Basketball Fans – Washington today.



** Arctic Gerbil Creations, Brighthouse Labs, and the Basketball Fans- Washington application are in no way associated with the NBA. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
